```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(rtweet)

theme_set(theme_light())


```

```{r}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      echo = TRUE,
                      dpi = 180,
                      fig.width = 8,
                      fig.height = 5)

```

```{r}

my_favs <- get_favorites(user = "daniel_dulaney",
                         n = 100000)

```

```{r}

my_favs %>% 
  count(screen_name, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(screen_name = fct_reorder(screen_name, n)) %>% 
  slice(1:30) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(screen_name, n, fill = screen_name)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() + 
  labs(title = "Twitter accounts I've liked most often") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```
